web-app.description: This is version 2.0 of an application to demonstrate an OAI Repository based on servlets. It was written by Jeffrey Young (jyoung@oclc.org), who should be contacted for more information.

servlet.description:
This servlet processes OAI verbs.
The initialization parameter names for this servlet are the "servlet path" that will be received by this servlet (after the filename extension is removed). The corresponding value is the name of the action class that will be used to process this request.
